title: Installation issue: kubernetes
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install kubernetes
...
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

```
k4-arch-01: ~$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2767-3f6a29e44b
* **Python:** 3.9.5
* **Platform:** linux-archrolling-broadwell
* **Concretizer:** original
```

took external go from system, but same error with spack-built go

### Additional information

```
k4-arch-01: ~$ spack install kubernetes
[+] /usr (external go-1.16.4-fqtmquz2alxbcpwo5vt2ajgcyvqr6vec)
==> Installing kubernetes-1.18.1-wif2hsw7tsjcrbahu4bu3ngm6y7t4fyk
==> No binary for kubernetes-1.18.1-wif2hsw7tsjcrbahu4bu3ngm6y7t4fyk found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/arch/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/33/33ca738f1f4e6ad453b80f231f71e62470b822f21d44dc5b8121b2964ae8e6f8.tar.gz
==> No patches needed for kubernetes
==> kubernetes: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j4'

1 error found in build log:
     10        ./vendor/k8s.io/kube-openapi/cmd/openapi-gen
     11    +++ [0520 14:39:42] Building go targets for linux/amd64:
     12        ./vendor/github.com/go-bindata/go-bindata/go-bindata
     13    warning: ignoring symlink /tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-kubernetes-1.18.1-wif2hsw7tsjcrbahu4bu3ngm6y7t4fyk/spack-src/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes
     14    go: warning: "k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/go-bindata/go-bindata/..." matched no packages
     15    F0520 14:39:53.846750 2219481 conversion.go:310] failed to find pkg: k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/apis/authorization
  >> 16    make[1]: *** [Makefile.generated_files:352: gen_conversion] Error 1
     17    make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     18    make: *** [Makefile:544: generated_files] Error 2


```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
